title: In Plain Sight
description: In Plain Sight is part of Kristen Probyâ€™s With Me in Seattle UniverseAriaI always wanted to be independent. But having a Navy SEAL for a brother and grandparents that hovered, it was nearly impossible. Then my grandparents died and my brother got deployed, leaving me alone for the first time in my life. That's when I met Carter, and everything changed. CarterI was only supposed to watch her. I was never supposed to talk to her, get to know her and crave her the way I did. I knew getting involved would causes problems, I knew falling for her was a mistake but I did it anyway. Damn the consequences. But what happens when reality comes crashing toward my fantasy? Will Aria understand or will I lose her forever?
author: S.A. Clayton
